patthana9.15:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana9.15:5.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.

patthana9.15:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana9.15:8.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana9.15:8.3: nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana9.15:8.5: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana9.15:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana9.15:11.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana9.15:13.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.

patthana9.15:23.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana9.15:24.1: Naaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.15:24.2: Naaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.15:24.3: Naaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo ca naaraṇo nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.15:25.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nakusalañca naaraṇaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana9.15:29.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana9.15:30.1: Naaraṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.15:31.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
